# First Message

This is an automatically generated page, directly written on Github. Unfortunately there seems to be no way to combine this with a local Jekyll installation to get best of both worlds (and the layouts).

***


```ruby
def send_messsage_to_world
  print "Hello World"
end
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
